snippet: The most striking phenomenon of the modern Olympics is surely commercial: The London Games, bejeweled with corporate logos, will be a spectacle of the sponsors' ingenuity. In some poor countries like Ethiopia, meanwhile, the Olympics has inspired a...
abstract: The most striking phenomenon of the modern Olympics is surely commercial: The London Games, bejeweled with corporate logos, will be a spectacle of the sponsors' ingenuity. In some poor countries like Ethiopia, meanwhile, the Olympics has inspired a culture of athleticism.

headline.main: The Greater Meaning of the Games Can Depend on Where You Live
